title: HomiePop - HuniePop Voice Mod [MOD ONLY]
description:
HuniePop is a unique sim experience for PC, Mac and Linux. It's a gameplay first approach that's part dating sim, part puzzle game, with light RPG elements, a visual novel style of presentation, an abrasive western writing style and plenty of "plot".

What _HomiePop_ does as a mod is replace all of the female characters with male voices, acting as part-humor, part-parody. It serves as a counterpart of the original game by changing nothing but the voice cast.

This mod is available for free to anyone who owns a copy of the original game.

Requires Version v1.2 of HuniePop (Censored or Uncensored) To Work

To Install
Step 1 - Download the torrent, check which one your OS is on.
Step 2 - Backup the original sharedassets0.assets file found in the "HuniePop_data" folder of the game directory
Step 3 - Select the .assets file based on your OS and paste to the "HuniePop_data" folder located at the game's folder.


This is the mod only, meaning it won't work by itself. You will need a copy of HuniePop for it to work.

This mod will work with Steam DRM and the DRM-Free versions of HuniePop v1.2. It will not work with other versions of the game
